steps.mobile: Check Left Plant for Rose Scent Charm

solution.txt: Move red ball to top white square
Move blue ball all the way to the left
Move bottom blue ball up and all the way left
Move red ball down, right and down to bottom red square
Move blue ball to far right
Move blue ball to far right
Move bottom red ball to top white square
Move blue ball to bottom blue square
Move blue ball to far left
Move blue ball down and left
Move blue ball down and left
Move bottom red ball up
Move blue ball left and down
Move red ball down, right and up to second red square
Move blue ball right
Move blue ball right
Move red ball down, left and up into top white square
Move blue ball up and right
Move red ball down to bottom blue square
Move blue ball left and up to top blue square
Move blue ball left and up
Move blue ball left
Move blue ball up and left to left white square
Move red ball down right and down to bottom red square
Move blue ball left
Move blue ball left
Move red ball to top white square
Move blue ball left and down
Move blue ball left
Move red ball down and right
